short_summary: Department of Fisheries and Oceans intends
description: Requests for procurement services for department of Fisheries and Oceans only
duration_in_months: That there will be 3 resources one at each tier of expertise
full_summary:
#### Government Tender Announcement: Cancelled

**Contract Title:** Procurement Specialist (SRV) - Junior, Intermediate, and Senior Levels

**Reference Number:** cb-5287-33795000 (Amendment 5)

**Publication Date:** May 5, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** May 29, 2023 (14:00:00)

**Amendment Date:** July 14, 2023

**Expected Contract Start Date:** July 1, 2023
**Expected Contract End Date:** June 30, 2026

**Tender Status:** Cancelled (Annulé)

### Overview

The Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO) issued a request for procurement (RFP) for the services of Procurement Specialist (SRV) resources to support DFO procurement activities on an as-and-when-notified basis. The initial requirement is for three (3) resources, one (1) resource per level of expertise (Junior, Intermediate, and Senior), which may fluctuate throughout the contract period.

### Key Details

*   **Period of Contract:** Not applicable due to the tender being cancelled.
*   **Trade Agreements:** Subject to the provisions of the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO-AGP), the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), and the Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP).
*   **Security Clearance:** DOS - Reliability (Verification of Organizational Designation) for companies and resources.
*   **Submission Requirements:** Not applicable as the tender has been cancelled.

### Cancellation Notice

Due to the contract cancellation, this tender announcement is now obsolete.enders are advised to monitor the government procurement websites for future opportunities.

**Contacting the Contracting Authority**

For information related to this tender announcement, please contact:

*   Charle Nwachukwu
*   Email: [Charles.Nwachukwu@dfo-mpo.gc.ca](mailto:Charles.Nwachukwu@dfo-mpo.gc.ca)
*   Phone: (613) 402-7103

### Note

Please note that the Task and Solutions Professional Services (TSPS) method of supply is subject to quarterly refresh cycles. Bidders who wish to become qualified Supply Arrangement (SA) holders should contact [SPTS.TSPS@TPSGC-PWGSC.GC.CA](mailto
